item.title: Netflix’s Chief Product Officer Is Leaving After 5 Years
item.description: Eunice Kim formerly worked at Google Play and YouTube.

item.title: Eunice Kim Out as Netflix’s Chief Product Officer
item.description: Eunice Kim, Netflix’s chief product officer, is leaving the streaming giant. The reasons behind Kim’s exit after almost five years at Netflix were not immediately clear. Netflix chief tech
